name: Teamlease
description: TeamLease’s long term philosophy and goals are best reflected by purpose of "Putting India To Work". TeamLease Services is one of India’s leading people supply chain companies offering a range of solutions to 3500+ employers for their hiring, productivity and scale challenges. A Fortune India 500 company listed on the NSE & BSE, TeamLease has hired 20 lakhs+ people over the last 20 years. One of India’s fastest growing employers, TeamLease also operates India’s first NAAC Accredited Skill University and India’s fastest growing PPP Degree Apprenticeship Program. The Company offers solutions to large, medium and small clients across the 3Es of Employment (over 2.9 lakhs associates/trainees), Employability (over 5 lakhs students) and Ease-of-doing Business (over 1000 employers). In FY2015, TeamLease rolled out DA (Degree Apprenticeship) to provide on-the-job training to apprentices.
Headline: Putting india to work
ShortDescription: Teamlease is India's leading recruitment and online job portal with over 1.6 lakh+ employees.

Highlights.name: Nationwide Job Search
Highlights.description: Teamlease facilitates job searches across various cities in India, allowing you to find suitable positions in your preferred location.

Highlights.name: One-Stop Shop for Blue-Collar Jobs
Highlights.description: Learn about Teamlease and how they assist individuals in finding blue-collar employment opportunities

Highlights.name: Teamlease: Your Gateway to Blue-Collar Careers
Highlights.description: This section delves into Teamlease's services and how they connect individuals with blue-collar job opportunities.

enhanced_description: TeamLease Services is a prominent 'people supply chain' company in India, functioning as an online job portal and comprehensive recruitment solution provider. It delivers a range of HR solutions to over 3500 employers, helping them address challenges related to hiring, productivity, and scale. With a history spanning over 20 years and more than 20 lakh people hired, TeamLease facilitates nationwide job searches, with a particular specialization in connecting individuals with blue-collar employment opportunities. Beyond traditional staffing, the company actively contributes to 'Employability' through India's first NAAC Accredited Skill University and a rapidly expanding PPP Degree Apprenticeship Program, which provides essential on-the-job training. TeamLease's services encompass the 3Es: Employment, Employability, and Ease-of-doing Business, catering to a diverse clientele including small, medium, and large organizations, including global enterprises.
competitive_advantages: Leading market position in India's people supply chain
Extensive experience and large talent pool (20 lakhs+ hires over 20 years)
Unique integration of staffing with skill development through an accredited university and apprenticeship programs
Ability to serve a wide range of client sizes (small, medium, large, and global enterprises)
Focus on holistic HR challenges (Employment, Employability, Ease-of-doing Business)
roi_benefits: Access to a large and specialized talent pool
scalability_features: Designed to support large user bases and high transaction volumes, evidenced by serving over 3500 employers, managing 2.9 lakhs associates/trainees, 5 lakhs students, and catering to large, medium, and small clients, including global enterprises. The service is explicitly stated to address clients' 'scale challenges'.
